dataset_id: PROVE MQUALS Reflectance at Jornada Experimental Range, New Mexico, 1997
title: PROVE MQUALS Reflectance at Jornada Experimental Range, New Mexico, 1997
summary: This study utilized low flying, aircraft-based radiometers for optical characterization of top-of-the-canopy reflectance at Jornada Experimental Range in New Mexico during the Prototype Validation Experiment (PROVE) in May 1997. The objective was to examine the usefulness of low-flying aircraft for Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) validation of land products.
